alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 11:25PM CDT until March 23 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Coden to 18 miles southeast of Petit Bois Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Fort Morgan and Alabama Port. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
